DOC.brief_summary: An open label , three way crossover study determine effect high fat breakfast low fat breakfast pharmacokinetics single dose regorafenib .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Food ( High Fat Low Fat Breakfast ) Pharmacokinetics Regorafenib
